Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 组织 ASP.NET 移动控件的样式特征。

span.span: Organizes style characteristics of an ASP.NET mobile control.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基类包含共有的所有移动控件的样式特性。The base class contains style characteristics common to all mobile controls. 继承的类类包含特定于其关联控件的其他样式特征。Classes that inherit from the class contain additional style characteristics specific to their associated control. 由于支持的移动控件设备的多样性，所有的样式属性是参考性的并可能或可能不会采用取决于目标设备的功能。Due to the diversity of devices supported by mobile controls, all style properties are advisory, and might or might not be honored depending on the capabilities of the target device. ## Examples 下面的示例演示在三个用户定义的样式对象。The following example demonstrates three user-defined styles in a object. 一个对象保留三个值对应于三个定义的样式。A object holds three values that correspond to the three defined styles. `OnClick`命令事件调用`SelectStyle`函数，这会更改属性的对象。The `OnClick` command event calls the `SelectStyle` function, which changes the property of the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileStyleSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileStyleSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileStyleSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileStyleSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

The specified background color for the style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与其他属性，不同属性不继承自其父级。Unlike the other properties, the property is not inherited from its parent. 例如，如果您设置为父控件，子控件上的蓝绿色属性将不会继承的蓝绿色背景色; 您必须显式设置子控件的`BackColor`属性设置为蓝绿色，也必须设属性控件的父级，并将样式表应用于子控件。For example, if you set the property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit a background color of cyan; you must explicitly set the child control's `BackColor` property to cyan, or you must set the property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control. 这是与级联样式表的行为保持一致。This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.

span.span: Introduction to the StyleSheet Control

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构并不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅从继承的样式类中调用。Called only from inherited style classes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来注册一个字符串属性支持继承，并且其默认值为空字符串 ("")。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to register a string property that supports inheritance and whose default value is an empty string (""). 此不完整的示例包含一个公共属性，其实现通过使用类的基类的默认索引器属性来访问此属性的元素。This incomplete example includes a public property, whose implementation accesses an element of this property by using the default indexer property of the base class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性必须是属性的对象。The value of the property must be the property of a object. 可以使用属性可以通过使用继承或通过在控件之间共享样式样式表的属性。You can use the property to share styles across controls, either by using inheritance or by using the property of a style sheet. 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba186999-7707-426b-9376-7eed6970e7b1)并[创建新样式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/da7f9825-3cc7-4c0f-9800-7d3cb15041d1)。For more information, see [Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba186999-7707-426b-9376-7eed6970e7b1) and [Creating New Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/da7f9825-3cc7-4c0f-9800-7d3cb15041d1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表包含的定义枚举。The following table contains the definitions of the enumerations. |枚举Enumeration|“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------|-----------------| ||00|没有大小设置为指定的对象。No size is set for the specified object. 这是默认值。This is the default value.| ||11|自动换行到下一行。Wrap to the next line.| ||22|文本不换行到下一行。The text is not wrapped to the next line.|
